name: OrderQtyData
description: Quantity semantics for the order. Exactly one of OrderQty, CashOrderQty, or (CIV) OrderPercent is generally provided.

fields.name: CashOrderQty
fields.notes: Approximate monetary amount; broker computes OrderQty for execution.

validation: Exactly one of OrderQty (38), CashOrderQty (152), or OrderPercent (516, CIV only) SHOULD be supplied.
If CashOrderQty is used, downstream ExecutionReports should reflect computed OrderQty.
hints: Use CashOrderQty when client sends a monetary amount that must be converted to units.
